Properties.ProtectedString:
-- // Updated for R15 avatars by StarWars
-- //Fixed Replication issue by TakeoHonorable
--remove us if all else fails
local Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")) local Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")) Debris:AddItem(script.Parent, 30)
local Tick,Cframe,Angles,Vec3,Instant,random,Wait,sqrt,color3,Pairs,sin,inf,pi = tick,CFrame.new,CFrame.Angles,Vector3.new,Instance.new,math.random,wait,math.sqrt,Color3.new,pairs,math.sin,math.huge,math.pi
local Spawn = spawn ----------------------------------------
local DAMAGE_PER_SECOND = 10
local Grenade = script.Parent local GrenadeScript = Grenade:WaitForChild("GrenadeScript") local Creator = GrenadeScript:WaitForChild("creator") local Character = Creator.Value.Character local ExplodeSound = Grenade:WaitForChild("ExplodeSound")
---------------------------------------
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instant("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player
Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in Pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
local Handling = false Grenade.Touched:Connect(function(part) --ignore collisions with firer's stuff if Character and part:IsDescendantOf(Character) then return end if not part or not part.Parent or not part.CanCollide then return end if Handling then return end Handling = true
--end grenade Grenade.Anchored = true Grenade.CanCollide = false Grenade.Transparency = 1
--play sound ExplodeSound:Play()
-- local basePos = Grenade.Position local upsideDownCF = Angles(0,0,pi)
--do explode local BlastPart = Instant('Part', workspace) BlastPart.FormFactor = 'Custom' BlastPart.Size = Vec3(1,1,1) BlastPart.Transparency = 0.3 BlastPart.Anchored = true BlastPart.CanCollide = false BlastPart.Archivable = false BlastPart.CFrame = Cframe(Grenade.Position)*Angles(-pi/2,0,0) local BlastCFrame = Cframe(Grenade.Position)*Angles(-pi/2,0,0) local BlastMesh = Instant('SpecialMesh', BlastPart) BlastMesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1080954' BlastMesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=70759279' Debris:AddItem(BlastPart, 10)
Spawn(function() for i = 0, 1, 0.2 do Wait() BlastPart.CFrame = Cframe(0, sqrt(i)*10,0)*BlastCFrame BlastMesh.Scale = Vec3(4 + 4*i, 4 + 4*i, 4 + sqrt(i)*24) end for i = 0, 1, 0.1 do Wait() BlastPart.CFrame = Cframe(0,10 - i*i*4,0)*BlastCFrame BlastMesh.Scale = Vec3(8 + i*2, 8 + i*2, 28 - i*i*8) BlastPart.Transparency = 0.3 + 0.7*i*i end BlastPart:Destroy() end)
Wait(0.2)
--create clouds local cloudList = {} for i = 1, 10 do local cloud = {} cloud.A = random()*10 cloud.B = random()*10 cloud.C = random()*10 cloud.Velocity = Vec3(random()-0.5, 0, random()-0.5)*6 -- local part = Instant('Part') part.Anchored = true part.CanCollide = false part.Archivable = false part.FormFactor = 'Custom' part.Shape = 'Ball' part.Size = Vec3(6,6,6) part.Transparency = 0.2 part.CFrame = Cframe(basePos + Vec3(random(-3,3), 2, random(-3,3)))*upsideDownCF part.TopSurface = 'Smooth' part.BottomSurface = 'Smooth' part.Name = 'PoisonCloud' -- local mesh = Instant('SpecialMesh', part) mesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1095708' mesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=70759279' mesh.Scale = Vec3(5,8,7) mesh.Name = 'Mesh' -- local smoke = Instant('Smoke', part) smoke.Color = color3(0,1,0) smoke.Opacity = 0.6 smoke.RiseVelocity = 0 smoke.Size = 0.6 smoke.Name = 'Smoke' -- cloud.Part = part -- cloudList[#cloudList+1] = cloud end
--track touching local LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap = {} local TouchingPartsMap = {} local TouchingHumanoidMap = {} for _, cloud in Pairs(cloudList) do cloud.Part.Touched:Connect(function(part) if not part or not part.parent then return end local hum = part.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid') if hum and hum.Parent and not IsTeamMate(Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hum.Parent),Creator.Value) and Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hum.Parent) ~= Creator.Value then TouchingHumanoidMap[hum] = true hum.WalkSpeed = 4
--initial damage if not LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap[hum] then UntagHumanoid(hum) TagHumanoid(hum,Creator.Value) hum:TakeDamage(10) LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap[hum] = Tick() end end end) end
--put the clouds into the workspace for _, cloud in Pairs(cloudList) do Debris:AddItem(cloud.Part, 15) --by 15 second we should have been done, --ensure that we don't leave behind anything if all else fails. cloud.Part.Parent = workspace end
--do stuff local StartTime = Tick() local LastTime = StartTime while true do --timestep Wait() local Now = Tick() local dt = Now - LastTime local Elapsed = Now-StartTime LastTime = Now
--progress local T = Elapsed/10
--end if T > 1 then break end
--do effects to clouds for _, cloud in Pairs(cloudList) do cloud.Part.CFrame = cloud.Part.CFrame * Cframe(cloud.Velocity*dt*(1-T)) cloud.Part.Transparency = 0.2 + 0.8*T cloud.Part.Mesh.Scale = Vec3(5 + 2*sin((cloud.A/10+1)*Elapsed), 8, 7 + 2*sin((cloud.B/10+1)*Elapsed)) cloud.Part.Smoke.Opacity = 0.6 - 0.6*T*T cloud.Part.Smoke.Size = 0.6 - 0.6*T cloud.Part.Smoke.Color = color3(0 + 0.3*(0.5*sin((cloud.A/10+1)*Elapsed+cloud.C)+0.5), 0.5 + 0.5*(0.5*sin((cloud.C/10+1)*Elapsed+cloud.B)+0.5), 0 + 0.3*(0.5*sin((cloud.B/10+1)*Elapsed+cloud.A)+0.5)) end
--do damage to humanoids for hum in Pairs(TouchingHumanoidMap) do local lastT = (LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap[hum] or Tick()) if Now-lastT > 0.5 then local torso = (hum.Parent or game):FindFirstChild('HumanoidRootPart') if torso then --find a nearby cloud local nearestCloud, atDist = nil, inf for _, cloud in Pairs(cloudList) do local sep = (cloud.Part.Position - torso.Position).magnitude if sep < atDist then nearestCloud = cloud atDist = sep end end if atDist < 5 then local dmg = (Now-lastT)*DAMAGE_PER_SECOND UntagHumanoid(hum) TagHumanoid(hum,Creator.Value) hum:TakeDamage(dmg) LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap[hum] = Now else TouchingHumanoidMap[hum] = nil LastTimeHumanoidDamagedMap[hum] = nil hum.WalkSpeed = 16 end else TouchingHumanoidMap[hum] = nil end end end end
Wait(2) --wait for the clouds to fade a bit --delete the clouds for _, cloud in Pairs(cloudList) do cloud.Part:Destroy() end --fix all of the humanoids for hum in Pairs(TouchingHumanoidMap) do hum.WalkSpeed = 16 end
--and finally get rid of us Grenade:Destroy() end)

local Tool = script.Parent Tool.Enabled = true
local Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players"))
local Instant,Pairs,Type,Tick,wrap,Delay,Wait,Pcall = Instance.new,pairs,type,tick,coroutine.wrap,delay,wait,pcall
local Cframe,Angles,Vec3,huge,abs,atan,sqrt,min,sin,cos,pi = CFrame.new,CFrame.Angles,Vector3.new,math.huge,math.abs,math.atan,math.sqrt,math.min,math.sin,math.cos,math.pi
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instant(ty) for k, v in Pairs(data) do if Type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local MouseInput = (Tool:FindFirstChild("MousePos") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "MousePos", Parent = Tool })
local Character; local Player;
local Humanoid = nil
local RELOAD_TIME = 8
local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") local NextFireAt = Tool:WaitForChild("NextFireAt") local ThrowSound = Handle:WaitForChild("ThrowSound")
local GrenadeScript = Tool:WaitForChild("GrenadeScript") local ExplodeSound = Handle:WaitForChild("ExplodeSound")
local Animations = { Throw = Tool:WaitForChild("ThrowAnim"); R15Throw = Tool:WaitForChild("R15ThrowAnim") }
local ThrowAnimation = nil
local function Now() return workspace.DistributedGameTime end
---------------------------------------------
local Velocity = 120 function computeLaunchAngle(dx, dy, grav) -- This function is nasty or what? :P -- There are ways to solve launch angle of a projectile given a point in 3D space -- This one solves for tan(theta)
-- Simplify the distance formula of a projectile local g = abs(grav) local inRoot = (Velocity * Velocity * Velocity * Velocity) - (g * ((g * dx * dx) + (2 * dy * Velocity * Velocity))) if inRoot <= 0 then return 0.25 * pi end local root = sqrt(inRoot) local inATan1 = ((Velocity * Velocity) + root) / (g*dx)
local inATan2 = ((Velocity * Velocity) - root) / (g*dx) local a1 = atan(inATan1) local a2 = atan(inATan2) if a1 < a2 then return a1 end return a2 end
---------------------------------------------
Tool.Equipped:Connect(function(mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
if Humanoid then if Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then ThrowAnimation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations["R15Throw"]) elseif Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R6 then ThrowAnimation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations["Throw"]) end end
--setup first anim / cursor cycle if Now() > NextFireAt.Value then Handle.Transparency = 0 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' else Handle.Transparency = 1 delay(NextFireAt.Value - Now(), function() mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png' Handle.Transparency = 0 end) end
Tool.Activated:Connect(function() --we track the reload time like this so that the player can't fire faster with --rapid dis / re-equipping, which will actually be common usage with this gear. if Now() > NextFireAt.Value then NextFireAt.Value = Now() + RELOAD_TIME -- local gr = Create("Part"){ TopSurface = 'Smooth', BottomSurface = 'Smooth', FormFactor = 'Custom', Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1), CFrame = Handle.CFrame, Anchored = false, Locked = true }
ExplodeSound:Clone().Parent = gr
local mesh = Create("SpecialMesh"){ TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88795021', MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88795005', Parent = gr }
local sc = GrenadeScript:Clone() sc.Parent = gr sc.Disabled = false sc:WaitForChild("creator").Value = Player
--calc velocity local sucess,MousePosition = Pcall(function() return MouseInput:InvokeClient(Player) end) MousePosition = (sucess and MousePosition) or Vec3.new(0,0,0)
local toTarget = MousePosition - gr.Position local dy = toTarget.y toTarget = Vec3(toTarget.x, 0, toTarget.z) local dx = toTarget.magnitude toTarget = toTarget.unit
Velocity = min(120, 40 + dx)
local theta = computeLaunchAngle(dx, dy, 196.2)
local vY = sin(theta)*Velocity local vX = toTarget.x * cos(theta) * Velocity local vZ = toTarget.z * cos(theta) * Velocity
gr.CanCollide = false Delay(0.1, function() gr.CanCollide = true end) gr.Velocity = Vec3(vX, vY, vZ) gr.Parent = workspace
if gr:CanSetNetworkOwnership() then gr:SetNetworkOwner(nil) end
--play sound / anim ThrowSound:Play() ThrowAnimation:Play(0,1,1)
--reload Handle.Transparency = 1 Tool.Enabled = false --mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png' Wait(RELOAD_TIME) Tool.Enabled = true Handle.Transparency = 0 --mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' end end) end)
Tool.Unequipped:Connect(function() if ThrowSound then ThrowSound:Stop() end
if ThrowAnimation then ThrowAnimation:Stop() ThrowAnimation = nil end end)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:Connect(OnChanged)

local Tool = script.Parent
local MouseInput = Tool:WaitForChild("MousePos",10)
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Input = (game:FindService("ContextActionService") or game:GetService("ContextActionService")) }
local Player,Character,Humanoid
--[[function Primary(actionName, inputState, inputObj) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer(Enum.KeyCode.X) end end]]
function Equipped() Player = Services.Players.LocalPlayer Character = Player.Character Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end
--[[Services.Input:BindAction("Primary",Primary,true,Enum.KeyCode.X,Enum.KeyCode.ButtonX) Services.Input:SetTitle("Primary","Quake") Services.Input:SetPosition("Primary",UDim2.new(.5,0,-.5,0))]] end
function Unequipped() --Services.Input:UnbindAction("Primary") end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
function MouseInput.OnClientInvoke() return (Humanoid and Humanoid.TargetPoint) or Vector3.new(0,0,0)--game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse().Hit.p end
